decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Framework Travel Plan dated 22/12/2014, SiBCAS flexible modular accommodation brochure, SK01, SK02, 402141 S-0, 402141 S-1 and covering letter received on  12/01/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The building hereby permitted shall be removed and the land restored to its former condition on or before 31 September 2016.

Condition : 4 - Prior to occupation, a full travel plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The provisions of the travel plan shall be implemented prior to occupation of the temporary building hereby approved.

Condition : 5 - Prior to occupation, details of the proposed cycle parking shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The cycle parking shall be installed in accordance with the approved details prior to first use of the development hereby approved and shall thereafter be retained as such.
description: Erection of a temporary single storey modular building for use as two classrooms and associated toilets until September 2016
